blocks.name: sbc2iedf
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbc2iedf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w1)), w2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w1)), w2)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  sbciedf(s0, c0, c2, w0, wsbc(s1, c1, w1), w2)
  sbciedf(s1, c1, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c3))
  anassrs(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  nfan(s1, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  a1i(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wnf(s1, w2))
  a1i(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbc2iedf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c1))→(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w1 ↔ w2)), d(s0, c1))
  sbciedf(s0, c0, c2, w0, [c1 / s1]w1, w2)
  sbciedf(s1, c1, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = c0), w1, w2)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c0, c1 ∈ c3)
  anassrs(w0, s0 = c0, s1 = c1, (w1 ↔ w2))
  nfan(s1, w0, s0 = c0)
  nfv(s1, s0 = c0)
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 = c0), F/(s1, w2))
  a1i(w0, F/(s0, w2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: rspc2daf
blocks.content: Double restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspc2daf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, w1, wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)))
  mpd(w0, wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s1, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)))
  mpd(w0, wral(s1, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, w2)))
  rspcdf(s0, c1, c0, w0, wral(s1, c3, w2), wral(s1, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)))
  nfral(s0, s1, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfsbc1v(s0, c0, w2)
  ralbid(s1, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
  nfan(s1, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)))
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w2)
  rspcdf(s1, c3, c2, w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w2), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)))
  nfsbc1v(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))))
  sbceq1a(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
  syl5rbbr(w0, w1, wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2)))
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, c2, w2)
  sbc2iedf(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1, c3, w0, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspc2daf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 → w1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2))→(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, w1, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w2)
  mpd(w0, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w2))
  mpd(w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w2), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, w2)))
  rspcdf(s0, c1, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, w2), ∀(s1 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w2))
  nfral(s0, s1, c3, [c0 / s0]w2)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfsbc1v(s0, c0, w2)
  ralbid(s1, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = c0), w2, [c0 / s0]w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, s0 = c0)
  nfv(s1, s0 = c0)
  adantl(w0, s0 = c0, (w2 ↔[c0 / s0]w2))
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w2)
  rspcdf(s1, c3, c2, w0, [c0 / s0]w2, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w2)
  nfsbc1v(s1, c2, [c0 / s0]w2)
  adantl(w0, s1 = c2, ([c0 / s0]w2 ↔[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w2))
  sbceq1a(s1, c2, [c0 / s0]w2)
  syl5rbbr(w0, w1, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w2, [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]w2)
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, c2, w2)
  sbc2iedf(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1, c3, w0, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: vtocl2d
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of two classes for two setvar variables. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtocl2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  pm2.43i(w0, w1)
  syl2anc(w0, wi(w0, w1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  vtocl2gf(s1, s0, c2, c3, c0, c1, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2)), wi(w0, w2))
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfim(s1, w0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s1, c2, w2)
  nfv(s0, wi(w0, w1))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), w0, w2, wsbc(s1, c2, w2))
  sbceq1a(s1, c2, w2)
  pm5.74da(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2), w1)
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2), w1, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2)))
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, w2)), w1), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  sbc2iegf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w2, w1)
  nfv(s0, w1)
  nfv(s1, w1)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm vtocl2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 → w1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2)→(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  pm2.43i(w0, w1)
  syl2anc(w0, (w0 → w1), c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c1)
  vtocl2gf(s1, s0, c2, c3, c0, c1, (w0 → w1), (w0 →[c2 / s1]w2), (w0 → w2))
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfim(s1, w0, [c2 / s1]w2)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s1, c2, w2)
  nfv(s0, (w0 → w1))
  imbi2d(s1 = c2, w0, w2, [c2 / s1]w2)
  sbceq1a(s1, c2, w2)
  pm5.74da(s0 = c0, w0, [c2 / s1]w2, w1)
  sylan9bb(s0 = c0, w0, [c2 / s1]w2, w1, [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]w2)
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, [c2 / s1]w2)
  syl2anc(w0, ([c0 / s0][c2 / s1]w2 ↔ w1), c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  sbc2iegf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w2, w1)
  nfv(s0, w1)
  nfv(s1, w1)
  nfv(s0, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: eqri
blocks.content: Infer equality of classes from equivalence of membership. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Oct-2017.)
